inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with cardiac AL amyloidosis using standard diagnostic techniques and criteria at the NAC
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who already have a cardiac device inserted, such as a permanent pacemaker (PPM), implantable cardioverter-defibrillator (ICD) or implantable cardiac monitor (ILR)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other pre-existing cardiac or other pathology which, in the investigators opinion, would adverse affect primary outcome data collection
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
